statements: SELECT lending_id, book_id, member_id, lending_date, due_date FROM book_lending_history;
SELECT * FROM book_lending_history;
SELECT lending_id, book_id FROM book_lending_history WHERE member_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM book_lending_history ORDER BY lending_date DESC;
SELECT lending_id, member_id, due_date FROM book_lending_history WHERE book_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM book_lending_history WHERE lending_date = '2022-01-15' AND member_id = 123 ORDER BY lending_date DESC;
SELECT book_id, COUNT(*) AS num_lendings FROM book_lending_history GROUP BY book_id HAVING num_lendings > 5 ORDER BY num_lendings DESC;
SELECT book_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(due_date, lending_date)) AS avg_days_lent FROM book_lending_history GROUP BY book_id ORDER BY avg_days_lent DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT member_id FROM book_lending_history WHERE lending_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY member_id ASC;
SELECT lending_id, book_id, member_id, lending_date, due_date FROM book_lending_history WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE() ORDER BY due_date ASC, lending_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BookLendingHistory;
SELECT book_id, user_id, checkout_date FROM BookLendingHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT book_id, due_date FROM DueDates ORDER BY book_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(book_id) AS total_books FROM BookLendingHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT book_id FROM BookLendingHistory WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM BookLendingHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, COUNT(book_id) AS num_books_checked_out FROM BookLendingHistory GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT book_id, user_id, IFNULL(return_date, 'Book has not been returned') AS return_status FROM BookLendingHistory;
SELECT book_id, COUNT(*) AS num_times_borrowed FROM BookLendingHistory GROUP BY book_id ORDER BY num_times_borrowed DESC;
SELECT BL.book_id, BL.user_id, BL.checkout_date, DD.due_date FROM BookLendingHistory BL JOIN DueDates DD ON BL.book_id = DD.book_id;
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE book_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM Books ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT title FROM Books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT * FROM LibraryMembers WHERE membership_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT lending_id, lending_date FROM LendingHistory WHERE member_id = 101 ORDER BY lending_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT title, author FROM Books WHERE title LIKE '%Harry Potter%';
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM Books ORDER BY author ASC, title DESC;
SELECT member_name, membership_type FROM LibraryMembers WHERE membership_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY member_name;

SELECT Books.title, LibraryMembers.member_name FROM Books INNER JOIN LendingHistory ON Books.book_id = LendingHistory.book_id INNER JOIN LibraryMembers ON LendingHistory.member_id = LibraryMembers.member_id WHERE LendingHistory.lending_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT * FROM members WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre='Mystery';
SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books WHERE author='Stephen King';
SELECT b.title, m.name, bl.lending_date FROM books b JOIN book_lending bl ON b.id = bl.book_id JOIN members m ON m.id = bl.member_id;
SELECT m.name, m.email, COUNT(*) as total_lendings FROM members m JOIN book_lending bl ON m.id = bl.member_id GROUP BY m.name, m.email ORDER BY total_lendings DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM books
SELECT * FROM members
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM members
SELECT book_id, title, author, publish_date FROM books
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM books WHERE author = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM books ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, category_name FROM books JOIN categories ON books.book_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
